name: shift-gear
caption: Shift Gear

effect.short: Raises the user's Attack by one stage and its Speed by two stages.
effect.full: Raises the user's [Attack]{mechanic:attack} by one [stage]{mechanic:stage} and its [Speed]{mechanic:speed} by two stages.

flavorText:
The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack stat and
sharply raising its Speed stat.
